hero.title: Get in Touch with
hero.subtitle: Planning your next transfer in Barcelona? Whether you're heading to the airport, cruise terminal, or a hotel, our team is ready to assist you with personalized support, fast responses, and complete flexibility.

intro.title: We're Here to
intro.paragraph1: We believe every journey should start with peace of mind. Our goal is to make the booking process simple and smooth â€” so you can focus on enjoying your trip.
intro.paragraph2: Have questions about transfers in Barcelona? Our team at Royal Transfers BCN is here to help â€” whether you need a quote, want to plan a custom route, or confirm a booking. We're committed to fast replies and hassle-free support.

cta.title: Ready to Book Your Transfer?
cta.subtitle: Get in touch now and let us take care of your Barcelona journey.

hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: We specialize in providing premium chauffeur and taxi services for both tourists and business travelers. Our mission is to deliver comfort, reliability, and a seamless travel experience across the vibrant city of Barcelona and beyond.

story.title: Our
story.paragraph1: Royal Transfers BCN began with a clear purpose â€” to make travel in Barcelona smooth, reliable, and stress-free. Our professional team provides private transfers for every occasion.
story.paragraph2: Whether you arrive at the airport, board a cruise, or travel to your hotel or meeting, we make sure your experience is comfortable from start to finish.

fleet.title: Modern Fleet
fleet.description: We offer a modern fleet of sedans, spacious vans, and luxury vehicles, all maintained with great care. Every car includes modern amenities to ensure a pleasant ride.

drivers.title: Multilingual Drivers
drivers.description: Our multilingual drivers help you feel welcome and confident as you move around the city. Their local knowledge and punctuality mean you can always travel with peace of mind.

service.title: Personalized Service
service.description: Whether for individual or group transfers, we adapt each service to your needs. Every journey is handled with attention to detail.

trust.title: Trusted
trust.description: Over time, we have earned the trust of our clients through consistent service and attention to detail. Royal Transfers BCN proudly holds a reputation for excellence and 5-star feedback.
trust.promise: No matter if you are visiting Barcelona for the first time or returning, your journey will always be handled with care. Choose Royal Transfers BCN â€” where private transport becomes a smooth and memorable part of your trip.

rating.title: Rated 5.0 â˜… on Google
rating.subtitle: Trusted by travelers, professionals, and locals alike â€” our customers consistently rate us 5 stars for punctuality, cleanliness, and service quality.

testimonial.quote: Booked a last-minute transfer from the airport and everything was perfect. The driver was early, polite, and the van was spotless. Will definitely use Royal Transfers BCN again!

testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what travelers say about Royal Transfers BCN.

review1.name: Sarah M.
review1.text: Absolutely fantastic service! Driver was waiting at arrivals, helped with luggage, and the Mercedes was spotless. Will definitely use again.

review2.name: Thomas K.
review2.text: Our flight was delayed by 2 hours but the driver was there when we landed. That's real service. Highly recommended!

review3.name: Maria L.
review3.text: Used Royal Transfers for our family trip. The 8-seater van was perfect and the driver was so friendly with the kids.

hero.title: Hourly Taxi Booking
hero.subtitle: Need a taxi that waits for you? Book by the hour for shopping, errands, events, or sightseeing. Flexible hourly packages with cars and vans for up to 8 passengers.

flexible.title: Stay Flexible
flexible.description: No need to order a new ride each timeâ€”your taxi waits for you.

fleet.title: Modern Fleet
fleet.description: Comfortable sedans, hybrids, and spacious vans for 7â€“8 passengers.

rates.title: Clear Hourly Rates

occasion.title: Any Occasion
occasion.description: Perfect for shopping, medical visits, sightseeing, and events.

packages.title: Hourly Taxi
packages.note: Prices depend on vehicle size and timing. Get your exact quote instantly.

step1.title: Choose Your Hours
step1.description: Choose your hours (3â€“8h) and tell us your itinerary.

step2.title: Get Your Quote
step2.description: Get a fixed hourly quote for sedan, luxury sedan, or van.

step3.title: Enjoy Your Day
step3.description: Enjoy your day with a taxi that waits & drives you everywhere.

faq1.question: What's included in the hourly price?
faq1.answer: The driver, vehicle, fuel, and waiting time within Barcelona city limits.

faq2.question: Can I extend my booking?
faq2.answer: Yesâ€”extra hours can be added on the day if available, at the same rate.

faq3.question: Do you offer vans for groups?
faq3.answer: Yesâ€”Mercedes Vito & V-Class vans for up to 7â€“8 people with luggage.

faq4.question: Can I use hourly taxi for sightseeing?
faq4.answer: Of courseâ€”ideal for visiting multiple attractions in one day without stress.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing

stops.title: Flexible Stops

routes.note: Prices depend on distance, time of day, and vehicle type. Get an exact quote in seconds.

step1.title: Share Your Route
step1.description: Share your route (pickup, destination, passengers, luggage) via booking form or WhatsApp.

step2.title: Receive Your Quote
step2.description: Receive a fixed quote with the best vehicle for your group and bags.

step3.title: Enjoy the Ride
step3.description: Enjoy the rideâ€”door-to-door with optional stops for food, photos, or shopping.

faq1.question: Can we request stops along the way?
faq1.answer: Yesâ€”quick photo/coffee breaks are free within reason. Longer detours can be added to your quote.

faq2.question: How do you calculate the price?
faq2.answer: Based on distance, time of day, and vehicle size. We'll send a fixed quote before you confirm.

faq3.question: Do you provide child seats?
faq3.answer: Infant and booster seats available on requestâ€”please note ages when booking.

faq4.question: Is there a night surcharge?
faq4.answer: Transfers between 22:00â€“06:00 may carry a small supplementâ€”this is included in your quote.

howItWorks.title: How Cruise Port Transfers Work
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple three-step process for a stress-free cruise experience

step1.title: Share Your Details
step1.description: Tell us your cruise line, terminal, ship name, pickup time, and passenger count.

step2.title: Receive Confirmation
step2.description: We'll send a fixed-price quote and driver details with meeting instructions.

step3.title: Meet Your Driver
step3.description: Your driver meets you at the agreed spot with a name sign and helps with luggage.

fleet.title: Our Cruise Transfer Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Modern, comfortable vehicles perfect for cruise passengers with luggage

faq.title: Cruise Port Transfer FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our Barcelona cruise transfer service

q1.question: Where will the driver meet me at the cruise terminal?
q1.answer: For arrivals, we meet you just outside customs with a name sign. For departures, we meet at your hotel or specified address. We'll send detailed meeting instructions with your booking confirmation.

q2.question: Do you help with luggage?
q2.answer: Yes! Our drivers assist with loading/unloading luggage at both pickup and drop-off points. All our vehicles have ample space for cruise luggage, including large suitcases.

q3.question: What if my cruise is delayed?
q3.answer: We monitor cruise arrivals and adjust pickup times accordingly. No extra charges for reasonable delays. For significant delays, we'll coordinate with you via WhatsApp/call.

q4.question: Are child seats available?
q4.answer: Yes, infant and booster seats are available free of charge. Please specify ages and requirements when booking so we can prepare the appropriate seats.

cta.title: Ready for a Stress-Free Cruise Transfer?
cta.subtitle: Book your Barcelona cruise port transfer today and travel with confidence

howItWorks.title: How Airport Transfers Work
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple three-step process for a stress-free airport experience

step1.title: Book Your Transfer
step1.description: Provide flight details, pickup time, passenger count, and luggage requirements.

step2.title: Receive Confirmation
step2.description: Get driver details, meeting point instructions, and flight tracking confirmation.

step3.title: Meet Your Driver
step3.description: Your driver waits at arrivals with your name sign and helps with luggage.

fleet.title: Our Airport Transfer Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Modern, comfortable vehicles perfect for airport transfers with luggage

faq.title: Airport Transfer FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our Barcelona airport transfer service

q1.question: Where will the driver meet me at the airport?
q1.answer: For arrivals, we meet you at the arrivals hall with a name sign. For departures, we pick you up at your hotel or specified address. We'll send detailed meeting instructions with your booking confirmation.

q2.question: What if my flight is delayed?
q2.answer: We monitor flight arrivals and adjust pickup times automatically. No extra charges for reasonable delays. For significant delays, we'll coordinate with you via WhatsApp.

q3.question: Are child seats available?
q3.answer: Yes, infant and booster seats are available free of charge. Please specify ages and requirements when booking so we can prepare the appropriate seats.

q4.question: How much luggage can I bring?
q4.answer: Sedans fit 3-4 suitcases + hand luggage. Vans fit 6-8 suitcases + hand luggage. For oversized items (golf clubs, skis), please mention when booking.

cta.title: Ready for a Stress-Free Airport Transfer?
cta.subtitle: Book your Barcelona airport transfer today and travel with confidence
